programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: Dirou Niya
programme.desc: The comedy takes place at a working-class cafe located in the heart of a neighborhood, where the characters are passionate about by football, and it's always the talk of the hour, especially with the presence of Mahmoud and Al Kushi, two ex-footballers fighting over glory.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun

programme.title: Child
programme.desc: In the hopes of giving her baby a better life, Akça, a hooker, is forced to give up her child, who is taken to be brought up by the wealthy Sule, but the situation changes after the latter has a baby of her own.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: El Karazoun
programme.desc: A Syrian businessman, Adnan, travels to Beirut and gets exposed to an accident at the port explosion, so he decides to disappear in order to teach his spoiled daughter, Nour, how to be self-reliant and discover the truth around her. However, Karim and Rabee try to seize Nour's wealth.

programme.title: Ahl Al Madina
programme.desc: The series presents a vast panorama of social and economic life and the conflict between those who want to erase the memory of the country so that history begins with them, and those who want to emphasize the continuity of the cultural heritage of the country.

programme.title: Sihr El Sharq
programme.desc: The series revolves around an English lady called Jane Digby,who's deeply fascinated by the East. She marries Sheikh Majool Al - Musallab ,who is a Badawi tribe leader and loves him dearly.

programme.title: Baad Edet Sanawat
programme.desc: It discusses the change between the past and the present, as the events are set between the 1980s and the year 2014 through Abu Nawras, who lives in a working-class neighborhood and has many children.

programme.title: Forsa Akhera

programme.title: Chrysalis
programme.desc: Nalan is a beautiful girl, who wins everyone's love with her kindness. She graduated with honors from the best schools in Turkey, however, she does not know anything about her parents except that her parents died in a car accident when she was young. She works as an interior architect at Koroglu Company, which owns an international hotel chain. Nalan meets the owner's son in the cafeteria, and it seems that this meeting will be the beginning of major transformations in their lives.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Mae Og yn teimlo'n flin wrth i adar bach fwyta ei fafon. Og feels angry when some little birds eat his strawberries.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Pan mae Twm Twcan yn dod o hyd i gist ar y traeth, mae'n arwain at ddiwrnod yn llawn cerddoriaeth hyfryd. When Twm Twcan finds a chest on the beach, it leads to a day of beautiful music.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Baba Pinc yn falch iawn o'i hun. Mae wedi creu gêm newydd sbon, ond a fydd pawb arall yn mwynhau ei chwarae cystal â hi? Will everyone enjoy playing Baba Pinc's new game?

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Heddiw mae ei ben yn y cymylau. Mae'r anifeiliaid yn ceisio denu ei sylw ond ma nhw hefyd yn mwynhau synfyfyrio. Pablo's head is in the clouds.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae'r Enfys yn diflannu. Oes rhywun neu rywbeth wedi mynd â hi? The rainbow disappears. Has someone or something taken it?

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw bydd yr antur yn mynd â ni i gyfandir Ewrop ac i Wlad Belg. Yma, byddwn ni'n dysgu am brifddinas Brwsel a'i phwysigrwydd i wleidyddiaeth Ewrop, We are in Belgium eating chocolate!

programme.title: Oli Wyn
programme.desc: Mae angen dau gerbyd arbennig iawn i dorri a symud coed: cynhaeafwr a blaenwr. Fe'u gwelwn yn gweithio yn Fforest Fawr, Caerffili. A look at the vehicles needed to cut down and move trees.

programme.title: New: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Mabli yn gwahodd ei ffrindiau i chwarae gwesty yn ei thy! When she forgets to listen to her guests' needs, Mabli's Hotel doesn't go quite as she'd hoped.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd morladron bach Ysgol Nantgaredig yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys yn ôl? Can the little pirates from Ysgol Nantgaredig help Ben Dant and Cadi?

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Mae Coco yn dysgu Bing sut i neud Bws Mawr a gyda'i gilydd maen nhw'n dychryn Fflop. Coco shows Bing how to do really good Big Boos and together they make Fflop jump.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae Ela wrthi'n cyflwyno sioe hud a lledrith pan ddaw Ben ar ei thraws. Mae yna elfen o hud a lledrith yn y gair, 'cocwn'. Something magical happens when the friends find a 'cocoon'.

programme.title: Yr Ysgol
programme.desc: Dewch i gwrdd â ffrindiau newydd yn Yr Ysgol. Mae'n amser chwarae, canu, dysgu a chreu! It's time to play, sing, learn and make with youngsters from two Welsh schools. New series.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae Dela yn cael cymorth ei chwaer fach i ddatrys dirgelwch diflaniad rhyfedd mewn coedwig wymon. Dela teams up with her little sister to solve a mysterious disappearance in a kelp forest.

programme.title: Ysbyty Cyw Bach
programme.desc: Mae Cyw wedi torri ei adain - ac yn gorfod mynd i Ysbyty Cyw Bach er mwyn ei thrwsio. Cyw breaks a wing and has to go to hospital.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Mae Odo'n darganfod bod ganddo allu rhyfeddol i weld pethau o'i gwmpas yn bell ac agos. Ond a yw Odo'n mynd i eistedd a gwylio yn hytrach nag ymuno mewn? Odo sees everything and everyone!

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae'r Dreigiau mewn picl pan fydd angen iddynt newid amserlen y rheilffordd. The Dragons get in a pickle when they need to change the railway's timetable.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, byddwn yn cwrdd â dau anifail sydd i'w canfod wrth fynd am dro, sef y ceffyl a'r hwyaden. We meet two animals that can be found when we go for a walk - the horse and the duck.

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae cinio Twrchyn yn diflannu, wedyn mae bocs bwyd Jêc yn mynd ar goll! Oes yna ysbryd?! First Twrchyn's lunch disappears, then Jêc's lunchbox walks away! Could it be a ghost?!

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Mae Og yn teimlo'n gyffrous iawn i ennill y wobr fawr am y tomatos gorau erioed. Og feels really excited to win the Best Tomatoes Ever prize.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Pan mae'r byd yn neidio a'n sboncio o'i gwmpas, mae Clem Crocodeil yn penderfynu mynd am dro i weld be neu bwy sydd y tu ôl i'r holl fownsio! Clem Crocodeil investigates some bouncing!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain

programme.title: Pablo

programme.title: Live The Let-Go Life
programme.desc: Joseph Prince provides insight on how to cast worldly cares onto God and inspire decisions that lead to success in life, even miracles!

programme.title: Embrace The Journey
